name: Charmander
flavorText:
Obviously prefers
hot places. When
it rains, steam is said to spout
from the tip of
its tail.

previous.name: Venusaur
previous.flavorText:
The plant blooms
when it is
absorbing solar energy. It stays
on the move to
seek sunlight.

next.name: Charmeleon
next.flavorText:
When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.flavorText:
Spits fire that
is hot enough to
melt boulders. Known to cause
forest fires
unintentionally.
